content.html: Dear Medical Twitter: After 2+ years of saving the rest of us from misinformation, please let CS twitter return a tiny favor: NYT did not make Wordle's words harder. Your symptoms are valid (it feels harder), but your diagnosis from Twitter info is not. 1/8
content.value:
Dear Medical Twitter: After 2+ years of saving the rest of us from misinformation, please let CS twitter return a tiny favor:

NYT did not make Wordle's words harder.

Your symptoms are valid (it feels harder), but your diagnosis from Twitter info is not.

1/8
